question: I have been Muslim for about a year and I want to know how do i study to become a Imam or how does one become a Imam
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
To become an Imaam or Moulana, generally, one studies at a Darul Uloom
(institute of higher Islamic learning). The course is generally 6 or 7
years. Such institutes have been established in the US, Canada, England,
South Africa, etc.

Since you have been a Muslim for only one year, we assume that you will have
to begin at an elementary level, which will require more time. Inform us of
which part of the world you would be interested in studying at, so that we
may advise you further.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
